title: disconnectin problems
body: i play lol in a professional gaming parlour on computers set for games of lol so i know its my profile that having problems since multiple guys here have no problem with there accounts, but every time game starts my page freezes forcing me to reset computer by the time i get back in match nearly over and i get stand down period and told im afk, this aint true so knowing it aint the computer what can i do to fix my account its getting frustrating now
